description: Details of Community Use Scheme, including use of the internal and external sports facilities pursuant to condition 20 of planning permission P/2011/4129 dated: 12/03/2010 for: A Material Amendment to planning permission 22/11/2011 for redevelopment involving the erection of a part single, two and three storey secondary school on the playing fields on the Northern part of the site and a single storey store building , greenhouse and polytunnel and sections of fencing and the provision of 76 car parking spaces, including 9 disabled spaces, with access off Dormers Wells Lane, cycle parking spaces, landscaping, hard surfaced games area and incidental features and playing fields on the Southern part of the site following demolition of the existing school and the reopening of the access off Allenby Road for bicycles and pedestrians; to add an additional storey of accommodation at first floor level above the SEN area on the West side of the new main school building
